price: Àwọn tó ṣàbòsí yí ọ̀rọ̀ náà padà (sí ọ̀rọ̀ mìíràn) yàtọ̀ sí èyí tí A sọ fún wọn. Nítorí náà, A sọ ìyà kalẹ̀ láti sánmọ̀ lé àwọn tó ṣàbòsí lórí nítorí pé, wọ́n ń rú òfin.
arabic: فَبَدَّلَ ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ قَوۡلًا غَيۡرَ ٱلَّذِي قِيلَ لَهُمۡ فَأَنزَلۡنَا عَلَى ٱلَّذِينَ ظَلَمُواْ رِجۡزٗا مِّنَ ٱلسَّمَآءِ بِمَا كَانُواْ يَفۡسُقُونَ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: fabaddala alladhīna ẓalamū qawlan ghayra alladhī qīla lahum fa-anzalnā ʿalā alladhīna ẓalamū rij'zan mina al-samāi bimā kānū yafsuqūna
